name: Sirtet
description:
Sirtet. Your classic game of tetris?

Enjoy a game of tetris! This game was a general introduction into the game development pipeline. Unity was used to help bring this game to life. This game was done for my Game Programming class at San Diego State University.

Instructions:

  • Use mouse to navigate the menu.
  • Further instructions in-game.

Creator(s):

Project by AC De Leon.
